set.name: DMD-21 Due-ma Start Deck: Invincible Fire Civilization

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your fire creatures. Whenever this creature wins a battle, untap it. Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your fire creatures. Power attacker +6000(While attacking, this creature gets +6000 power) This creature can attack untapped creatures. Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your fire creatures. When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that costs 4 or less. ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You make take an evolution creature from the revealed cards, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ Shield trigger(When this Card Type is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may use it for no cost) Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 3000 or less. Mana Arms 5: If you have 5 or more fire cards in your mana zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ Shield trigger(When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it for no cost) When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 3000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ Shield trigger(When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost) Destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total cost 6 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your fire evolution creatures may each cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms 3: When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 3 or more fire cards in your mana zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. If you do, this creature and that creature battle. While battling, this creature gets +1000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ Shield trigger(When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it for no cost) When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 1000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each turn, you may have the first fire creature you summon cost 1 less. It can't cost less than 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature attacks each turn if able.
